name: io.github.VictoriaMetrics-Community/mcp-victoriametrics
description: MCP Server for VictoriaMetrics. Provides integration with VictoriaMetrics API and documentation

environment_variables.name: VM_INSTANCE_ENTRYPOINT
environment_variables.description: URL to VictoriaMetrics instance (it should be root URL of vmsingle or vmselect), for example http://localhost:8428 or https://play.victoriametrics.com

environment_variables.name: VMC_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Optional: API key from VictoriaMetrics Cloud Console (if you have deployment in VictoriaMetrics Cloud)

environment_variables.name: MCP_DISABLED_TOOLS
environment_variables.description: Comma-separated list of tools to disable

environment_variables.name: MCP_DISABLE_RESOURCES
environment_variables.description: Disable all resources (documentation tool will continue to work)
